title: FACE NOIR
description:
Genre: Adventure / Quest

New York, the end of 1929. Starting difficult period for the American people - the Great Depression. Times when just a few months, the country mired in corruption, the American dream will turn into dust and shaken faith in God. The protagonist quest Jack Del Nero, a former police officer, earns his living sleuthing and periodically flooded whiskey his memories of a successful past. Once in the hands of him misses the murder case of his colleague Emily.

Features
The storyline in the style of noir
Atmosphere 30s, built in the smallest details
Puzzles of varying difficulty
More than 30 characters
Research and discovery of three famous cities
Non-linear gameplay
Jazz soundtrack Immersive

Features of release
Face Noir
Version of the game - v1.9.1
Do not cut / recoded

How to change language:
After Installed program:
1. Extract and open crack folder
2. Open file ALI213.ini/SKIDROW.ini/3DM.ini with notepad
3. find this line "Language = russian" edit it to "Language = english"

System requirements:
Operating system: Windows XP / Windows Vista / Windows 7
Processor: Intel Pentium 4 processor with a clock frequency of 2 GHz
RAM: 1 GB
Video Card: 256 MB compatible with DirectX 9
Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX
Hard disk space: 1 GB


By Doug Stamper.
